name: Shapes shooter
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Move with WASD or the arrow keys
  • Click on the screen to shoot in that direction
  • Escape (un)pauses

I don't have a very good imagination, ergo the name. Just a proof of concept really, Shapes Shooter is a game made in Javascript to be played directly from the browser window. If there is sufficient interest I might update the game by adding:

  • Sound
  • Assets such as sprites with animations, although I personally like the current aesthetic.
  • A function to save the top 5 high scores locally.
  • More enemy types
